00042 void StringUtilsTest::testCreation()
00043 {
00044         StringUtils *utils = new StringUtils;
00045         CPPUNIT_ASSERT( utils != NULL );
00046         delete utils;
00047 }

00049 void StringUtilsTest::testmethod_STLTrimLeft()
00050 {
00051         std::string s1("---Hello---");
00052         std::string s2("   Goodbye   ");
00053         StringUtils::STLTrimLeft(s1);
00054         CPPUNIT_ASSERT(s1 == "---Hello---");
00055         StringUtils::STLTrimLeft(s2, '-');
00056         CPPUNIT_ASSERT(s2 == "   Goodbye   ");
00057         StringUtils::STLTrimLeft(s1, '-');
00058         CPPUNIT_ASSERT(s1 == "Hello---");
00059         StringUtils::STLTrimLeft(s2);
00060         CPPUNIT_ASSERT(s2 == "Goodbye   ");
00061 }
00062 
00063 void StringUtilsTest::testmethod_STLTrimRight()
00064 {
00065         std::string s1("---Hello---");
00066         std::string s2("   Goodbye   ");
00067         StringUtils::STLTrimRight(s1);
00068         CPPUNIT_ASSERT(s1 == "---Hello---");
00069         StringUtils::STLTrimRight(s2, '-');
00070         CPPUNIT_ASSERT(s2 == "   Goodbye   ");
00071         StringUtils::STLTrimRight(s1, '-');
00072         CPPUNIT_ASSERT(s1 == "---Hello");
00073         StringUtils::STLTrimRight(s2);
00074         CPPUNIT_ASSERT(s2 == "   Goodbye");
00075 }

00077 void StringUtilsTest::testmethod_STLTrimLeft_wide_version()
00078 {
00079         std::wstring s1(L"---Hello---");
00080         std::wstring s2(L"   Goodbye   ");
00081         StringUtils::STLTrimLeft(s1);
00082         CPPUNIT_ASSERT(s1 == L"---Hello---");
00083         StringUtils::STLTrimLeft(s2, '-');
00084         CPPUNIT_ASSERT(s2 == L"   Goodbye   ");
00085         StringUtils::STLTrimLeft(s1, '-');
00086         CPPUNIT_ASSERT(s1 == L"Hello---");
00087         StringUtils::STLTrimLeft(s2);
00088         CPPUNIT_ASSERT(s2 == L"Goodbye   ");
00089 }

00091 void StringUtilsTest::testmethod_STLTrimRight_wide_version()
00092 {
00093         std::wstring s1(L"---Hello---");
00094         std::wstring s2(L"   Goodbye   ");
00095         StringUtils::STLTrimRight(s1);
00096         CPPUNIT_ASSERT(s1 == L"---Hello---");
00097         StringUtils::STLTrimRight(s2, '-');
00098         CPPUNIT_ASSERT(s2 == L"   Goodbye   ");
00099         StringUtils::STLTrimRight(s1, '-');
00100         CPPUNIT_ASSERT(s1 == L"---Hello");
00101         StringUtils::STLTrimRight(s2);
00102         CPPUNIT_ASSERT(s2 == L"   Goodbye");
00103 }

00120 void StringUtilsTest::testmethod_FormatString()
00121 {
00122         wchar_t buffer[64];
00123         int count = 64;
00124         int value = 101;
00125         FormatString1(buffer, count, L"%d", value);
00126         CPPUNIT_ASSERT(std::wstring(buffer) == L"101");
00127 
00128         int min=0;
00129         int max=100;
00130         FormatString2(buffer, count, L"[%d..%d]", min, max);
00131         CPPUNIT_ASSERT(std::wstring(buffer) == L"[0..100]");
00132 
00133         int a=0;
00134         int b=1;
00135         int c=2;
00136         FormatString3(buffer, count, L"%d%d%d", a, b, c);
00137         CPPUNIT_ASSERT(std::wstring(buffer) == L"012");
00138 
00139         int d=3;
00140         FormatString4(buffer, count, L"%d%d%d%d", a, b, c, d);
00141         CPPUNIT_ASSERT(std::wstring(buffer) == L"0123");
00142 
00143         int e=4;
00144         FormatString5(buffer, count, L"%d%d%d%d%d", a, b, c, d, e);
00145         CPPUNIT_ASSERT(std::wstring(buffer) == L"01234");
00146 }
00147 
00148 void StringUtilsTest::testmethod_ToString()
00149 {
00150         CPPUNIT_ASSERT(StringUtils::ToString(1, 2, '0') == L"01");
00151         CPPUNIT_ASSERT(StringUtils::ToString(1, 3, '0') == L"001");
00152         CPPUNIT_ASSERT(StringUtils::ToString(1000, 3, '0') == L"1000");
00153 }
